Title: An Act Amending Section One of Republic Act Numbered Twenty-One Hundred and Ninety-Five
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 678
An Act Amending Section One of Republic Act Numbered Twenty-One Hundred and Ninety-Five
Section 1. Section one of the Republic Act Numbered Twenty-one hundred and ninety-five is amended to read as follows:

"Sec. 1. The barrios of Sibuco and Malayal and the sitios of Cawit-Cawit, Anungan, Parang-Parang, Mantibo, Panganuran, Sarawagan, Lawi-Lawi, Tigbuaya, Pantamalitog, Maga, Pangian, Malog, Paniran, Lintangan, Limason and Siluput in the Municipality of Siocon, Province of Zamboanga del Norte, are separated from said municipality to be known as the Municipality of Sibuco, same province, with the seat of government at the present site of the barrio of Sibuco."

Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: March 7, 1984
